src:
Andre Gomeš otpušten iz bolnice, Everton se oglasio saopštenjem
05 Nov 2019, 16:15 by Zile
Fudbaler Evertona, Andre Gomeš, napustio je bolnicu nakon teške povrede u nedeljnoj utakmici sa Totenhemom.
Portugalski reprezentativac je u ponedeljak uspešno podvrgnut operativnom zahvatu na polomljenom skočnom zglobu, a danas je otpušten iz bolnice.
– Nakon uspešne operacije Andre Gomeš je otpušten iz bolnice i nastaviće rehabilitaciju pod budnim okom našeg medicinskog tima, navedeno je u saopštenju kluba sa „Gudison Parka“.Z
a sada nije poznato koliko će Gomeš odsustvovati sa terena, ali su u Evertonu uvereni da će oporavak biti stoprocentan i da će se Portugalac vratiti u startnu postavu „karamela“.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Andre Gomes discharged from hospital, Everton made the announcement
05 Nov 2019, 15:15 by Zile
Everton footballer Andre Gomes has left the hospital after suffering a serious injury in Sunday's game with Tottenham.
On Monday, the Portuguese national team successfully underwent surgery on a broken ankle and was discharged from hospital today.
- After successful surgery, Andre Gomes has been discharged from the hospital and will continue rehabilitation under the watchful eye of our medical team, according to a statement from the Goodison Park club.
and now it is unknown how long Gomes will be absent from the field, but Everton are convinced that the recovery will be one hundred percent and that the Portuguese will return to the starting lineup of "caramel".
